channel.title: Need help with pickup, and droprate!
channel.description: I need help with 2 things, souce is the hybrid v3 one with like 634 items, i need help with the drop rates i dont understand i've looked and got some help and still nothing so i'm hoping somone can tv and just show me, also i need help fixing the command were admin can pickup cuz right now its only for owner+...

item.title: Need help with pickup, and droprate!
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

well this is all i can find for pickup (::item) : }

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("item"))
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with pickup, and droprate!

item.title: Need help with pickup, and droprate!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Drop rates: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470354.0.html
Command: Change the rights from “c.playerRights >= 3” to “c.playerRights >= 2”
